reviews.text: É claro que não seria algo grandioso pois o Governador Valadares é uma cidade pequena. Ademais, havia uma área não completa que parecia ser meio abandonada. No entanto, o conteúdo apresentado neste museu é muito informador sobre a cidade, verdadeiramente aprendi muito sobre a cidade do meu pai e senti mais orgulho da história da minha família. Além do mais, a arquitetura antiga preservada agrada os olhos. O atendimento também foi ótimo, as moças que trabalham lá conversavam conosco e nos ofereciam mais informações sobre o museu e a cidade. É uma pena que muitos não conhecem este museu, pois realmente vale a pena o visitar para conhecer cada vez mais a nossa história!
Uma excelente opção para conhecer a história de Governador Valadares. O acervo poderia melhorar. A planta original da cidade precisa de restauração urgente.
Me surpreendeu. Apesar do espaço ser alugado, tem muitos atrativos e retrata a história da cidade. Mais pessoas deveriam conhecer.
Relembrei de coisas que fizeram parte da minha família e da minha vida.

One of the best Italian restaurants in Dublin,  in my opinion, for many years. Recently, the restaurant has been refurbished and is now even cosier and more comfortable than it used to be. Also, the menu is very keenly priced and the early-bird menu is especially good value with the Bellini thrown in at no extra charge. The Italian staff are all totally professional, efficient, friendly and welcoming.

The staff was nice and friendly but the dish I had wasn't that great. The presentation was very good but taste and texture could have been better.

Looking at the other reviews, everyone seems to like so maybe it was just me. I will try something different next time.

For everyone else, go there and make up you own mind.

Visited this restaurant by chance on a quiet weeknight. Service was superb as was the food. Mushroom ravioli was the best we’ve ever had compared to many other similar restaurants (our favourite dish). Reasonable prices for the area with many specials. We will definitely be back!

Excellent food and excellent service, went here for a family get together and went for the set menu. Everyone raved about the starters and main courses. Excellent wine too. Slightly disappointed I didn't get the pizza as it looked amazing going to other tables. I'll definitely be back for the pizza, I might be changing my review to five stars. Keep up the excellent work folks! Viva Italia!

Best Italian restaurant in Dublin. 
Definitely our favourite place to have meals whether it's just a quick lunch or romantic dinner!!!
Highly recommended! 10/10

Service was awesome! Server was always super attentive even for refill my water. And give me tips about sauces and what to mix with them.

The food was so fresh! I really enjoyed everything overall. I went for the Restaurant week and they have a special menu with nice prices. Other than a full menu experience is a highly cost.

The only downside for me, I don't eat anything spicy. I always explained that and request nothing spicy on my dishes. I have a limited tasted for spiciness that I can handle. Nothing in my order was supposedly spicy but the sausage was. Worst part is that the sausage was the first thing I tried and after that all my broth was contaminated with the flavor. So all the rest of the items tasted similar to the sausage.

For me, sausage (separating if it's or not spicy) it's not the best option to cook on broth and I think they should know better. 

Neither the pasta nor the vegetables balls were my favorite.

Interesting concept. Great service all around. Quality of proteins was very good. My only complaint if I have one is with four people it is difficult to cook enough at once on the small grill pan on the table. Which translated into quite a long dinner.

Always have a good experience going to Melting Pots. The staff have always been very nice, helpful and friendly. The food is phenomenal, nothing like it anywhere else. It can be expensive and they could have a few more drink options, but overall it's a great place for high end dining.

The new menu items were fantastic. Melting pot continues to push the envelope and redefine what it means to be an amazing restaurant, let alone one that serves fondue. The staff was extremely professional, provided excellent recommendations and were incredibly attentive. I would definitely come here again.

Today I visited for the first time and was delighted with the service. My friend came from Puerto Rico and I mentioned it to our server and she came with a plate decorated in chocolate letters saying Welcome to Bethlehem and the Puertorican flag. That was so awesome and great customer service. The fondue was good and the ambiance.  We had a great first time, totally recommend it.
